name: Skyward Cat V.1.2
description:
Welcome to Skyward Cat!

Utilize revolutionary feline aviation technology in this new original pixel game. 

Objective: dodge birds, collect coins, and try to set the high score

Controls: 

-Space or tap to start

-Arrow Keys, WASD or drag (mobile) to move

-Press the start icon to restart

Play the game on scratch! https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/667703498/
